getGroupAdmin(uint256).details: Returns the address of the group admin. The group admin can be an Ethereum account or a smart contract.

getMerkleTreeDepth(uint256).details: Returns the depth of the tree of a group.

getMerkleTreeRoot(uint256).details: Returns the last root hash of a group.

getMerkleTreeSize(uint256).details: Returns the number of tree leaves of a group.

hasMember(uint256,uint256).details: Returns true if a member exists in a group.

returns._0: True if the member exists, false otherwise.

indexOf(uint256,uint256).details: Returns the index of a member.
